title: Amid Mahomes angst, NFL eyes replay on slides
description: NFL replay assist is expected to expand this offseason into plays that could include the quarterback slide, sources told ESPN.
author: Adam Schefter

title: Mets' Cohen: Alonso negotiations 'exhausting'
description: The Mets held their first winter event for fans in five years at Citi Field, and Pete Alonso was a notable absence.
author: Jorge Castillo

title: 'One of the worst decisions I've seen' - should Lewis-Skelly have seen red?
description: The decision left Mikel Arteta "fuming", pundits were baffled, while Arsenal fans were furious.

title: 'I felt like crying for him' - but Man City recover from 'horrific' start
description: It was a difficult debut for Manchester City's Abdukodir Khusanov, but his errors were more excusable than the one that cost Chelsea.

title: Patience pays off for Al Horford, who found his home and NBA glory
description: The Celtics' veteran leader took a long, winding road to his first NBA title. He never took the easy path, and he's reaping the rewards of his vision.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Pete Carroll, Raiders agree to 3-year contract to make him franchise's next head coach
description: Carroll did not coach last season after parting ways with the Seahawks in January 2024.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Pep says Khusanov will learn from tough debut - was starting him a mistake?
description: Pep Guardiola has backed Man City newcomer Abdukodir Khusanov to learn from a difficult debut against Chelsea, in which he was at fault for the Blues' third-minute opener, after Sky Sports pundit Jamie Redknapp said it was a mistake to start the defender.

title: Arteta 'absolutely fuming' over Lewis-Skelly red card
description: Mikel Arteta was "absolutely fuming" over Michael Oliver's decision to send Myles Lewis-Skelly off in the first half of Arsenal's 1-0 win over Wolves.
